title: Charmed
description: Crew Carlisle is enemy number one.He’s also my new boss.I need this internship as much as Crew needs an ego lobotomy.He’s arrogant, cocky, and annoyingly good looking.Our families have despised one another since long before I was born.The man loathes me, and he makes no effort to hide his contempt.But everything I thought I knew isn’t as it seems.And Crew isn’t who I thought he was.I’ve never fully given my heart away, and this is the last man that I should give it to.But walking away isn’t as easy as I expected.Crew Carlisle is my kryptonite.And falling for my nemesis is not an option.
author: Laura Pavlov
